lead_paragraph: ALPERT--Philip, 90. Born NYC, fought WWII. Attended Adelphi and Columbia. Programmer and systems analyst. Survived by wife, Louise; daughters Lori, Wendy, Tracy; granddaughter, Aurelia. 1/3
